metadata.description: Not used, but needed to pass arm-ttk test `Location-Should-Not-Be-Hardcoded`.  We instead use the `workspace-location` which is derived from the LA workspace
[concat('Region to deploy solution resources -- separate from location selection',parameters('location'))]
Workspace name for Log Analytics where Microsoft Sentinel is setup
resource group name where Microsoft Sentinel is setup
subscription id where Microsoft Sentinel is setup

connectorUiConfig.title: Cyfirma Brand Intelligence Alerts
connectorUiConfig.DescriptionMarkdown: The Cyfirma DeCYFIR Alerts data connector enables seamless log ingestion from the DeCYFIR API into Microsoft Sentinel. Built on the Microsoft Sentinel Codeless Connector Platform, it leverages the DeCYFIR Alerts API to retrieve logs. Additionally, it supports DCR-based [ingestion time transformations](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/logs/custom-logs-overview), which parse security data into a custom table during ingestion. This eliminates the need for query-time parsing, enhancing performance and efficiency.

graphQueries.metricName: Total Domain IT Asset Alerts logs received
Total Executive People Alerts logs received
Total Product Solution Alerts logs received
Total Social Handlers Alerts logs received
Total Malicious Mobile Apps Alerts logs received

dataTypes.name: CyfirmaBIDomainITAssetAlerts_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
CyfirmaBIDomainITAssetAlerts_CL
       | where TimeGenerated > ago(12h)                | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

dataTypes.name: CyfirmaBIExecutivePeopleAlerts_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
CyfirmaBIExecutivePeopleAlerts_CL
       | where TimeGenerated > ago(12h)                | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

dataTypes.name: CyfirmaBIProductSolutionAlerts_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
CyfirmaBIProductSolutionAlerts_CL
       | where TimeGenerated > ago(12h)                | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

dataTypes.name: CyfirmaBISocialHandlersAlerts_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
CyfirmaBISocialHandlersAlerts_CL
       | where TimeGenerated > ago(12h)                | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

dataTypes.name: CyfirmaBIMaliciousMobileAppsAlerts_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
CyfirmaBIMaliciousMobileAppsAlerts_CL
       | where TimeGenerated > ago(12h)                | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

resourceProvider.permissionsDisplayText: Read and Write permissions are required.

instructionSteps.title: Cyfirma Brand Intelligence Alerts
instructionSteps.description: Connect to Cyfirma Brand Intelligence Alerts

dataFlows.transformKql:
source
| extend TimeGenerated=alert_created_date
| extend Alert_title=['title']
| extend category = 'Brand Intelligence'
| project-away alert_created_date, ['title'], notes

source
| extend TimeGenerated=alert_created_date
| extend Alert_title=['title']
| project-away alert_created_date, ['title'], notes

source
| extend TimeGenerated=alert_created_date
| extend Alert_title=['title']
| project-away alert_created_date, ['title'], notes

source
| extend TimeGenerated=alert_created_date
| extend Alert_title=['title']
| project-away alert_created_date, ['title'], notes

source
| extend TimeGenerated=alert_created_date
| extend Alert_title=['title']
| project-away alert_created_date, ['title'], notes

schema.description: This custom table provides Executive People Alerts data from Cyfirma

schema.name: CyfirmaBIProductSolutionAlerts_CL
schema.description: This custom table provides Product Solution Alerts data from Cyfirma

schema.description: This custom table provides Malicious Mobile Apps Alerts data from Cyfirma

Built on the Microsoft Sentinel Codeless Connector Platform, it leverages the DeCYFIR Alerts API to retrieve logs. Additionally, it supports DCR-based [ingestion time transformations](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/logs/custom-logs-overview), which parse security data into a custom table during ingestion. instructionSteps.title: Cyfirma Brand Intelligence Alerts
instructionSteps.description: Connect to Cyfirma Brand Intelligence Alerts

properties.descriptionHtml:
Note: Please refer to the following before installing the solution:

Review the solution Release Notes

There may be known issues pertaining to this Solution, please refer to them before installing.

The [Cyfirma Brand Intelligence] solution integrates with Microsoft Sentinel to provide real-time insights into brand-related threats such as impersonation, fake domains, malicious social media profiles, and fraudulent mobile apps. This integration enables security teams to monitor and respond to digital brand abuse, protecting customers, employees, and reputation. Enriched intelligence is ingested into Microsoft Sentinel for threat correlation, alerting, and automationhelping organizations detect and mitigate brand threats quickly and efficiently.

Data Connectors: 1

Learn more about Microsoft Sentinel | Learn more about Solutions
